# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/issue340.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/issue340.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/table.txt ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/table.txt ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
add_test(NAME Certification_Tests/ISSUE_340/issue340.cir COMMAND Xyce issue340.cir )
set_property(TEST Certification_Tests/ISSUE_340/issue340.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;issue340;expression;conditionalexpr;resistor;transient;abm;expression_breakpoints")
set_tests_properties(Certification_Tests/ISSUE_340/issue340.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP issue340.cir)
add_test(NAME Certification_Tests/ISSUE_340/issue340.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} issue340.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/ISSUE_340/issue340.cir.prn issue340.cir.prn )
set_tests_properties(Certification_Tests/ISSUE_340/issue340.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED issue340.cir)
